name: broadcaster-backend
description: Broadcaster enables any/every citizen to bring any form of corruption to the notice of appropriate authorities and the general public. Users can also report on things that need government intervention.

scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run undo:db && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run migrate:db && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run seed:db && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build && node dist/app.js
scripts.pre-test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run undo:db && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run migrate:db && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run seed:db
scripts.test: npm run pre-test && cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=text --reporter=html mocha --timeout=10000 --require @babel/polyfill --require @babel/register --exit ./src/test/index.test.js
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && babel src -s -d dist --copy-files
scripts.create:tables: cross-env NODE_ENV=development && npm run migrate:db && npm run seed:db
